findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive permissions to manipulate various settings and functions, including buyback, fees, transaction amounts, and more.

findings.title: Buyback permission can call triggerBuyback that’s initiate buyback
findings.description: The Buyback permission has the ability to call the triggerBuyback function, which initiates a buyback.

findings.title: Buyback permission can clean buyback multiplier
findings.description: The Buyback permission has the ability to clean the buyback multiplier, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: AdjustContractVariables permission can change buyback multiplier settings
findings.description: The AdjustContractVariables permission has the ability to modify buyback multiplier settings.

findings.title: AdjustContractVariables permission can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The AdjustContractVariables permission has the ability to modify the maximum allowed transaction amount.

findings.title: ExcludeInclude permission can include in and exclude from dividends
findings.description: The ExcludeInclude permission has the ability to include or exclude users from receiving dividends.

findings.title: ExcludeInclude permission can include in and exclude from fee and transaction amount
findings.description: The ExcludeInclude permission has the ability to include or exclude fees and transaction amounts, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: AdjustContractVariables permission can change fees
findings.description: The AdjustContractVariables permission has the ability to modify fee settings.

findings.title: AdjustContractVariables permission can change fee receivers
findings.description: The AdjustContractVariables permission has the ability to modify the fee receivers, which could lead to unauthorized changes and potential security risks.

findings.title: AdjustContractVariables permission can change swap threshold and disable/enable swap
findings.description: The AdjustContractVariables permission has the ability to modify the swap threshold and enable or disable swaps.

findings.title: AdjustContractVariables permission can change target liquidity values
findings.description: The AdjustContractVariables permission has the ability to alter target liquidity values, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: AdjustContractVariables permission can change distribution criteria
findings.description: The AdjustContractVariables permission has the ability to alter the distribution criteria, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: AdjustContractVariables permission can add and remove pair
findings.description: The AdjustContractVariables permission has the ability to add and remove pairs, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: AdjustContractVariables permission can change feesOnNormalTransfers value
findings.description: The AdjustContractVariables permission has the ability to modify the feesOnNormalTransfers value.

findings.title: AdjustContractVariables permission can set launched at value
findings.description: The AdjustContractVariables permission has the ability to set the 'launched at' value, which may lead to unauthorized changes.
